title: 2006년 Agustin Antonio Alfaro v. State 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Agustin Antonio Alfaro v. State. 판결일: 2006-12-07. 법원: Court of Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Agustin Antonio Alfaro v. State
**판결일**: 2006-12-07
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX


## 판결문 요약








Opinion issued December 7, 2006







     







In The

Court of Appeals

For The

First District of Texas






NO. 01-05-00151-CR






AGUSTIN ANTONIO ALFARO, Appellant


V.


THE STATE OF TEXAS, Appellee






On Appeal from the 263rd District Court

Harris County, Texas

Trial Court Cause No. 936473






O P I N I O N

	Appellant, Agustin Antonio Alfaro, appeals the trial court's judgment
convicting him of aggravated sexual assault of a child.  See Tex. Pen. Code Ann.
§ 22.021(a)(2)(B) (Vernon Supp. 2006).  He pleaded not guilty to a jury.  The jury
found him guilty, and set his punishment at life in prison.  In three issues, appellant
claims that the trial court erred by denying his motion for a mistrial after a spectator
assaulted him, by refusing to allow cross-examination concerning the victim's sexual
history, and by allowing improper jury argument by the State's attorney.  We
conclude that the trial court was within its discretion to deny appellant's motion for
mistrial, that appellant failed to preserve error regarding his inquiry into
complainant's sexual experience by not making an offer of proof, and that appellant
failed to preserve error regarding the State's jury argument by failing to object at trial. 
We affirm.Background	Appellant met and moved in with complainant's mother when complainant was
about five years old.  Though the couple did not marry, they lived toge...
